trans-unit.source: Contains border styles for the cells in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bevat de randstijlen van de cellen in een <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> besturingselement.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control allows you to fully customize its appearance, including the borders of the cells and headers.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>beheer kunt u het uiterlijk, met inbegrip van de randen van de cellen en -koppen volledig wilt aanpassen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties that allow you to set the appearance of the cell border.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>heeft <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>Eigenschappen waarmee u kunt het uiterlijk van de rand van de cel ingesteld.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: However, if you need to further customize the borders, the DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle class allows you to set the style of the border on the individual sides of the cells.
trans-unit.target: Als u nodig hebt voor het verder aanpassen van de randen, kunt de DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle-klasse u echter de stijl van de rand instellen voor de afzonderlijke zijden van de cellen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties of DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle represent the left, right, top, and bottom border of a cell, respectively.
trans-unit.target: De <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>Eigenschappen van DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle vertegenwoordigen de links, rechts, top of onderrand van een cel, respectievelijk.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set these properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> to produce various appearances for the borders between the cells.
trans-unit.target: U kunt deze eigenschappen instellen op de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A>Eigenschappen van de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>voor het produceren van verschillende weergaven voor de randen tussen de cellen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedRowHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedColumnHeadersBorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AdvancedCellBorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style for all of the borders of a cell.
trans-unit.target: Opgehaald of ingesteld van de randstijl voor alle van de randen van een cel.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> properties are not set to the same <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> value, the All property value is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Als de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A>, en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A>Eigenschappen zijn niet ingesteld op de dezelfde <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>waarde, alle waarde voor de eigenschap is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Top%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Right%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle.Left%2A>

trans-unit.target: De opgegeven waarde voor het instellen van deze eigenschap is geen geldige <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref> waarden.

trans-unit.target: De opgegeven waarde voor het instellen van deze eigenschap is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle"> </xref>.
